title: 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bath for rent in Sunset
posting_body: Located at 30th Ave between Vicente and Ulloa, in the Sunset Parkside area.
We have a single family in-law for rent, Two bedroom.
living space w/kitchen.
1 bathroom.
Two rooms with windows and both with back yard view.
Close by the park with a lot of parking spaces available on street, easy access to downtown, SFSU, and supermarkets.
#66 bus is down the block, and the Muni L line are just one and half blocks away from the house.
* Looking for someone quiet, clean and respectful, ideal for students
* One year lease minimum
* No- smoking, drugs, or drinking parties.
* No-Pets.
* Monthly rent $1950/mo .
Additional Costs: $75 per person includes regular use: Water, Gas & Electricity, Garbage and Internet.
Washer and dryer are available.
* Security deposit $ 2000.
Cleaning fee $300.
( cleaning fee is refundable upon the unit is cleaned as time of moving out).
* Move-in cost : $4400.
( security deposit + first month rent + cleaning fee ).
Current credit report, payroll stub and driver license or ID are required for appointment.
Unit is ready to move-in.
Inquiry, question and set up appointment, by email.
Please send email and short introduction about yourself and who is going to move in to the email address by replying.
Reply for appointment.
